19 // ===========================================================================
20 /*
21  \class MDP
22  \author Castronovo Michael
23 
24  \brief Interface of a MDP problem.
25  It has been designed to address:
26  - DISCRETE state space (int)
27  - DISCRETE action space (int)
28  - SINGLE reward (double)
29 
30  \date 2015-05-14
31 */
32 // ===========================================================================
33 class dds::MDP : public IMDP
34 {

203  int getIniState() const throw (MDPException)
204  {
205  if (!isKnown())
206  {
207  std::string msg;
208  msg += "Cannot retrieve the initial state of an ";
209  msg += "unknown MDP!\n";
210 
211  throw MDPException(msg);
212  }
213 
214  return iniState;
215  }
216 
217 
225  const std::vector<double>& getP() const throw (MDPException)
226  {
227  if (!isKnown())
228  {
229  std::string msg;
230  msg += "Cannot retrieve the transition matrix of an ";
231  msg += "unknown MDP!\n";
232 
233  throw MDPException(msg);
234  }
235 
236  return P;
237  }
238 
239 
246  RewardType getRType() const throw (MDPException)
247  {
248  if (!isKnown())
249  {
250  std::string msg;
251  msg += "Cannot retrieve the type of rewards of an ";
252  msg += "unknown MDP!\n";
253 
254  throw MDPException(msg);
255  }
256 
257  return rType;
258  }
259 
260 
269  const std::vector<double>& getR() const throw (MDPException)
270  {
271  if (!isKnown())
272  {
273  std::string msg;
274  msg += "Cannot retrieve the list of rewards means of an ";
275  msg += "unknown MDP!\n";
276 
277  throw MDPException(msg);
278  }
279 
280  return R;
281  }
282 
283 
292  const std::vector<double>& getV() const throw (MDPException)
293  {
294  if (!isKnown())
295  {
296  std::string msg;
297  msg += "Cannot retrieve the list of rewards variances of ";
298  msg += "an unknown MDP!\n";
299 
300  throw MDPException(msg);
301  }
302 
303  return V;
304  }
